general_info.title: General information for printing configuration
general_info.general_line: BAT files parameters:
%1 path to bat file that sets printing configuration variables:
LOGFILE_DIR - path to log dir
DITA_OT_DIR - XMetaL DITA SDK path
XMETAL_DITA_SDK_DRIVE
IN_FILE_DIR_BACK_SLASH input directory
IN_FILE_DIR
IN_FILE_NAME_ONLY - name without extension
IN_FILE_EXT - .xml, .ditamap etc
OUT_FILE_DIR_BACK_SLASH output directory
OUT_FILE_DIR
OUT_FILE_NAME_ONLY - name without extension
OUT_FILE_EXT - .xml, .ditamap etc
DITAVAL_PATH - full path to ditaval file
DITAVAL_PATH_BACK_SLASH - full path to ditaval file
DSDK_PARAM_ALL - combines all params with prefix DSDK_PARAM_<param name> to the one line /<param name>:<param value>
IN_ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME_ONLY - a real name of input file (not temporary copy)
Content of "param" branches will be concatenated with content of parent "bat_line" tag in a resulting bat file.
XMetaL instructions:
cmd_disable_xmetal_preprocessing
cmd_generated_file_extension - required
cmd_disable_xmetal_merging
cmd_alternative_topic_merge_xslt - topicmerge.xsl is default
cmd_always_open_log
cmd_disable_config - don't show config in the list of available configs
cmd_set_filter - this is alternative location of ditaval file if it wasn't selected in "print dialog"
cmd_default_config - XMetaL sets this value when "default configuration" is selected
cmd_open_with - external application for opening and viewing. "SYSTEM_DEFAULT" forces to use system default settings
cmd_enable_xmetal_pdf_index
cmd_alternative_fop_path
cmd_preserve_temp_files - all temporary files are copied to \Documents and Settings\<user name>\Local Settings\Temp\XMetaL\log
cmd_disable_map_print - should disable map printing for current configuration (not implemented)
cmd_disable_topic_print - should disable topic printing for current configuration (not implemented)
cmd_check_logfile_for_failure - if the name of output file is unknown - force to check logfile for "failure" string (not implemented)
cmd_extended_debug_info - 0 no log file (actually we always have it) , 1 - regular logfile, 2 - we add /debug instruction to DSDK_PARAM_ALL veriavble
cmd_xft_options_form - name of the xft form for options dialog, should be in the Application\Forms directory.
cmd_preview_in_xmetal - if html or pdf try to open result in xmetal
cmd_log_succeeded_text - check log file for string if found, build is succeeded
cmd_log_failed_text - check log file for string if found, build is failed
cmd_output_as_dir - don't check/ask for file name as output. "Open With" will open folder
output directory: DSDK_PARAM_outdir
1) is taken from GLOBALS section from config file
2) is overwritten by particular configuration or via output dialog
3) if no information provided source file directory is output directory
